casebody.data:
No. 8708-9244 Consolidated SHUSHAN BROS. & CO. v. DRENNAN & HILLCOAT, ET AL., Appellants. Meyer S. Driefus, Chas. J. Rivet, attorneys for plaintiff and appellant. T. S. Walmsley, Monroe & Lemann, attorneys for defendant and appellee.

Orleans Appeal.

(November 17, 1924, Opinion and Decree.)

(December 15, 1924, Rehearing Refused.)

(January 13, 1925, Writ of Certiorari and Review to Supreme Court.)

(See 158 La. 480, 104 South. 214.)
